Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
iCard, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbandonedShipCard, AbandonedStationCard, CombatZoneCard, EpidemicCard, MeteorSwarmCard, OpenSpaceCard, PiratesCard, PlanetCard, SlaversCard, SmugglersCard, StardustCard
public abstract class Card extends Object implements iCard
Abstract class representation of an adventure card.
